original_text: Surely I have behaved and quieted myself, as a child that is weaned of his mother: my soul is even as a weaned child.
korean_text: 실로 내가 내 영혼으로 고요하고 평온하게 하기를 젖 뗀 아이가 그의 어머니 품에 있음 같게 하였나니 내 영혼이 젖 뗀 아이와 같도다

sentences.original_text: Surely I have behaved and quieted myself
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 나를 잘 다스리고 조용하게 하였다

sentences.original_text: as a child that is weaned of his mother
my soul is even as a weaned child
sentences.korean_translation: 내 영혼이 젖 뗀 아이와 같도다
